data.text: @GovKathyHochul It’s going down because we all have testing kits now and people are testing themselves not reporting the positives.

@bd_george @ooo33364988267 @DVT_PPX @GovKathyHochul No, what he said was that the Delta variant occurred in the summer, which is factually true for the US. ooo333 doesn’t have to look at the chart to say that.
What Papi said referred to the chart, ignoring the overall history of the pandemic.
@brooklyn3r @ooo33364988267 @DVT_PPX @GovKathyHochul Really?!!?  😱And that’s what the comment was about too. 🤫
